The country is in ruins, and there are calamities from the king and thieves.
By the power of this sutra, in this life they will experience light suffering.
Either a temporary headache or obtaining bad clothes and bad food,
Or encountering scolding and other humiliations,
All their past karmic hindrances will be spontaneously eliminated.
Good sons, those who uphold this sutra should give rise to this thought:
In the past, I wandered in the ocean of birth and death,
And towards all sentient beings, I created many evils.
Unwholesome karma increased day and night.
Now that I am aware of it, I dare not conceal it.
And confess their past misdeeds with a sincere mind.
They will develop unshakable faith in the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha.
If those people
Have committed evil deeds towards the Buddha, Dharma, Sangha, Pratyekabuddhas, Arhats, parents, or teachers,
Their clothing and food will all be exhausted.
But by the power of this sutra, all such karma will be eliminated and their clothing and food will be sufficient.
If those people have karma to suffer in the hells,
The suffering of separation from loved ones, the suffering of being born blind,
Or the karma of having no genitals or having two genitals, all will be eliminated.
Moreover, due to the power of past jealous, hateful, and evil karma,
They will fall into the realms of Yama, animals, hungry ghosts, and other evil destinies.
But by the power of this sutra, all such evil karma will be eliminated without exception.
All their merit will increase and flourish.
Good sons, wherever this Dharma gate exists,
Those people will always be protected by this sutra.
Their merit will be complete and their wishes fulfilled.
One will always enjoy wealth and happiness, and evil karma will be eliminated.
There will be no untimely death or evil dreams.
There will be no suffering from illness, and one will always be victorious in battles, with one's lifespan extended.
One will be endowed with physical strength and have great authority.
All worldly humans, devas, nagas, and spirits will follow one's will.
One will not encounter evil poisons, water, fire, or disasters.
Moreover, by the power of upholding this divine mantra,
One will always receive predictions from the buddhas.
If there are good men and good women
Who hear this divine mantra, uphold it, recite it,
Either write it themselves or have others write it, and respectfully make offerings,
Those good men and good women
Will all attain the merits and virtues as explained above.

19. Sata-dina 20. Svaha. Good sons, this divine mantra
is expounded by thirty thousand Tathagatas and is universally protected.
I now also proclaim this divine mantra
in order to benefit all sentient beings,
to enable them to attain peace and joy and always receive protection,
to eliminate their illnesses and enable them to be reborn in the Buddha lands.
If there are people who think like this:
'As the Buddha has said, the merits of the divine mantra
how can I now accomplish it?'
They should get up early in the morning, be pure,
generate great compassion towards all sentient beings, and give rise to a compassionate mind.
Eliminate jealousy, arrogance, and anger,
respectfully and single-mindedly, in front of a Buddha image,
offer incense, flowers, and food on a vast scale,
and pray with the mind to the Buddhas of the ten directions.
Recite this divine mantra one hundred and eight times.
For each flower, recite the mantra once.
With each flower, make offerings to the Buddha.
This person will then fulfill all their wishes according to their aspirations.
They will also see the buddhas in their dreams.
At the time of death, they will behold the buddhas and bodhisattvas.
After leaving this body, they will definitely be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.
They will be endowed with longevity, appearance, and strength.
All enemies will give rise to joy.
When this mantra was spoken, sixty thousand beings attained the forbearance of the non-arising of dharmas.
They forever eliminated all hindrances and fulfilled their wishes.
